summary: This file, when executed with the bat console command, gives you the draconic and Greybeard version of shouts. Place the txt file in your Skyrim directory.. then, in-game press Shift and ~  ,type bat dragonshouts and Enter.. get to the shouts menu and enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to use those cool shouts that dragons use? I got a bit curious myself and found out some stuff, using Skyrim Viewer, so here\'s a list of shouts for use with the player.addshout XXXXXXX console command:

Fire Dragon Fireball (Ancient Dragon):  10C4DF
Fire Dragon Breath (Ancient Dragon): 10C4E0
Frost Dragon Frost Breath (Ancient Dragon): 10C4E1
Frost Dragon Ice Storm (Ancient Dragon): 10C4E2
and..
Alduin Storm Call (Meteor Storm): 4C40B

There\'s also the Greybeard versions of the \"normal\" shouts:

Greybeard Elemental fury: 10F734
Greybeard Dismay: 10F733
Greybeard Unrelenting Force: 10F732
Greybeard Ice Form: 10F730
Greybeard Frost Breath: 10F72F
Greybeard Fire Breath: 10F72E
Greybeard Disarm: 10F72D

In order to use them you also need to unlock three words of power via the player.teachword XXXXXX and player.unlockword XXXXXXX console commands:

DragonFire1: 252C3
DragonFire2: 252C4
DragonFire3: 252C5

Note that all the above shouts have a cooldown of 5, so they require no messing with the shout recovery multiplier.. Basically you can spam shouts the way dragons and Greybeards do..

For easier use, here\'s a batch file to use with the bat console command
author: someone229
